tool_description:
Recognise the sound that is playing in any recording! You can use the API by sending the URL of the sound file or directly upload the file in the request!

✅ Very simple API
✅ High uptime
✅ Fast response times
✅ High reliability
✅ Supports mp3/ogg/wav/mp4/wav/avi files of up to 128MB of size
✅ Supports Spotify and Google Drive URLs

If you need support, want to request extra features or need a custom plan, contact us at: https://t.me/dashydata
name: Shazam Song Recognition API
title: Shazam Song Recognition API

api_list.name: Recognize song by URL
api_list.description:
Recognise the song playing in a URL that contains an MP3 file  (mp3/ogg/wav)

URL that you can use for testing: https://www.chosic.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Alla-Turca(chosic.com).mp3
